'''''Â¿QuiÃ©n quiere ser millonario?''''' ([[English language|English]] [[translation]]: ''Who wants to be a millionaire?'') is a [[Colombia]]n [[game show]] based on the original [[British language|British]] format of ''[[Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?]]''. The [[game show|show]] is hosted by Paulo Laserna Philips. The main goal of the [[game]] is to win 300 million [[Colombian peso]] (earlier 210 million [[Colombian peso|COP$]]) by answering 15 [[multiple-choice]] [[question]]s correctly. There are three ''lifelines'' - fifty fifty, phone a friend and ask the audience. ''Â¿QuiÃ©n quiere ser millonario?'' is broadcast from September 2000 to today. It is shown on the Colombian [[TV station]] [[Canal Caracol]]. When a [[contestant]] gets the fifth question correct, he will leave with at least [[Colombian peso|COP$]]1,000,000. When a contestant got the tenth question correct, he left with at least [[Colombian peso|COP$]]10,000,000.
